Starscream/Gotron

Starscream was busy removing the spark, when someone else came over 
to look at the body. He assumed it was Drillbit or something, until 
he heard KitKat yell and than noticed that it was Hell Beast and a 
crony. He immediatly pulled out his launchers.

"MAKE ONE MORE MOVE AND I'LL BLOW YOUR ASS STRAIGHT BACK TO 
CYBERTRON!!!" Starscream saw Waspinator land, and Gotron ran over, 
and kept his guns on him. He looked to Starscream.

"I don't like this. They know this isn't Megatron. They know we're 
suspecting something. They just sent this clone to throw us off the 
trail. I suspect the pigmentation problem in the Inferno drones were 
done on purpose, to make us think that Megatron wasn't a clone."

"You're right. Now Hell Beast, Waspinator, and whoever the hell you 
are, I won't stand for this. I am Starscream, former ruler of the 
decepticons, and I am not afraid to kick any of your asses. You are 
vastly out numbered, so I suggest you get back to your bases and wait 
there. NO ONE IS GOING TO TAKE ADVANTAGE OF US!!!"
______________________________________________________________________

Prebon took Koj's shots. They were some of the worst pain he 
imagined. He would pay dearly. He pulled out The Tamer. He knew all 
about mind controlling technology. He had basically invented it. He 
knew the weapons the Maximals were having. They probably had some 
sort of anti-chip installed in them. Well, that protected against hm 
taking control of all the functions. But nothing had been developed 
yet to counter act the results of when one of his chips took control 
of an essence of a person. It wouldn't put them under Prebon's full 
control, but basically, and tehy would have a good vs. evil thing in 
their personalities that would eventually drive them mad. He shoved 
the Tamer into the gash he made in Koj's chest with his sword. He 
smiled evily, and pulled the trigger, sending a chip into Koj's spark.

He pulled out and looked for Spears. Gone. She must have a cloak. But 
he was far from finished with her. He saw what happened when the two 
programs fought. Now one of three things will happen: She'll have a 
double personality. One day she'll be the happy go lucky Spears of 
the Maximals, and the than suddenly she'll be the evil Spears of the 
Trainers. The next, the personalities merge. It would either be 
Maximal loyalty with Trainer personality, or the other way around. 
The final thing, is she would be blank and lifeless. She would have 
no will power, nothing. She would be bland. Unable to express 
emmotions. No personality. She would have no name, no loyalty, and 
would just be walking through life aimlessly. It didn't matter, 
because when he got a new chip on her, he would take her back to teh 
base and reprogram her like Slayer. But for now, he had lost.

"This is far from finished Ramulus! Slayer, everyone retreat! Oh, and 
have fun with that Ninja bot over there! HAHAHAHA!" Prebon activated 
his cloak and slipped away, along with the other Trainers. He sent a 
direct message to Koj's spark.

*Come to our base if you are with us. If you are not, than you will 
die if you come.*

The Trainers abandoned the forest.
